tweet.full_text:
The original post has 101 replies. As that's below your requested 500, I analyzed all of them for sentiment.

- Positive: 18% (supportive of Bongino's return, patriotism, or service).
- Negative: 72% (criticism of quitting, perceived sellout, or lack of action).
- Neutral/unclear: 10% (images, off-topic, or ambiguous).

This reflects diverse views, with criticism dominant.

result.full_text:
Call to Action: 
From occupied Palestine to occupied Turtle Island, from the prison cell to the detention center, we know that our struggle is interconnected, & our enemy is one & the same. We affirm our commitment to the liberation of all members of our community, especially our Black & brown siblings‚Äîincluding abolishing ICE & DHS. 

Show up to the ICE-watches & rallies at the federal immigration courts. Follow @nycicewatch & @immigrationcoalition for the most up-to-date calls.
